Sentencas: In this paper, an output feedback model predictive tracking control method is proposed for constrained nonlinear systems, which are described by a slope bounded model.
Titulo: Output Feedback Model Predictive Tracking Control Using a Slope Bounded Nonlinear Model

Sentencas: In order to solve the problem, we consider the finite horizon cost function for an off-set free tracking control of the system.
Titulo: Output Feedback Model Predictive Tracking Control Using a Slope Bounded Nonlinear Model

Sentencas: For reference tracking, the steady state is calculated by solving by quadratic programming and a nonlinear estimator is designed to predict the state from output measurements.
Titulo: Output Feedback Model Predictive Tracking Control Using a Slope Bounded Nonlinear Model

Sentencas: The optimized control input sequences are obtained by minimizing the upper bound of the cost function with a terminal weighting matrix.
Titulo: Output Feedback Model Predictive Tracking Control Using a Slope Bounded Nonlinear Model

Sentencas: The cost monotonicity guarantees that tracking and estimation errors go to zero.
Titulo: Output Feedback Model Predictive Tracking Control Using a Slope Bounded Nonlinear Model

Sentencas: The proposed control law can easily be obtained by solving a convex optimization problem satisfying several linear matrix inequalities.
Titulo: Output Feedback Model Predictive Tracking Control Using a Slope Bounded Nonlinear Model

Sentencas: In order to show the effectiveness of the proposed method, a novel slope bounded nonlinear model-based predictive control method is applied to the set-point tracking problem of solid oxide fuel cell systems.
Titulo: Output Feedback Model Predictive Tracking Control Using a Slope Bounded Nonlinear Model

Sentencas: Simulations are also given to demonstrate the tracking performance of the proposed method.
Titulo: Output Feedback Model Predictive Tracking Control Using a Slope Bounded Nonlinear Model
